description: TechVision Solutions is looking for talented Software Development Engineer (SDE) interns to join our vibrant engineering team. As an SDE intern, you will work on real-world projects, collaborate with experienced engineers, and contribute to building scalable applications.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain web applications using React and TypeScript
Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code
Participate in code reviews and learn best practices
Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers and product managers
Implement UI components based on design specifications
Write unit tests for developed features
qualifications: Currently pursuing or recently completed B.Tech/B.Sc in Computer Science or related field
Strong grasp of Data Structures and Algorithms
Excellent communication and team collaboration skills
Self-motivated with ability to work independently
benefits: Hands-on experience with modern tech stack
Opportunity for conversion to full-time role
